title: "If you could" type id
content:
[http://www.ifyoucould.co.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034559/http:/www.ifyoucould.co.uk/ "http://www.ifyoucould.co.uk/")

Would love to know what font is used for the “Print serious 2008...” text on the site.

It’s awesome!

comments.content:
been calling myself a graphic designer for decades, yet never even knew American Typewriter came with italics, too.  
surprisingly beautiful.
Thank you so much! Really appreciate it.
